english: Boycott bad experiences, refuse pirated experiences. Be aware of self-defense and being deceived. Visiting experiences is good for your brain, but too much experience visit can harm your health. Manage your time well and enjoy a healthy lifestyle.
translation: Boicotta le brutte esperienze, rifiuta le esperienze piratate. Sii consapevole dell'autodifesa e dell'essere ingannati. Le esperienze di visita fanno bene al cervello, ma troppe visite di esperienza possono danneggiare la tua salute. Gestisci bene il tuo tempo e goditi uno stile di vita sano.

english: Boycott bad experiences, refuse pirated experiences. Be aware of self-defense and being deceived. Visiting experiences is good for your brain, but too much experience visit can harm your health. Manage your time well and enjoy a healthy lifestyle.
translation: Boicotta le brutte esperienze, rifiuta le esperienze piratate. Sii consapevole dell'autodifesa e dell'essere ingannati. Le esperienze di visita fanno bene al cervello, ma troppe visite di esperienza possono danneggiare la tua salute. Gestisci bene il tuo tempo e goditi uno stile di vita sano.

description: button label

english: I consent to Roblox’s collection, use, and storage of my voice recording for moderation and safety purposes only.
translation: Acconsento alla raccolta, all'utilizzo e alla conservazione della mia registrazione vocale solo per motivi di moderazione e sicurezza.

description: A warning to users that changing their username will remove their verified badge status
english: Warning: Changing your username will remove your verified badge status. Are you sure you want to do this?
translation: Attenzione: La modifica del nome del display rimuoverà lo stato del badge verificato. Sei sicuro di volerlo fare?

description: Bundle
Emotes
Label for the Body category in the Catalog which contains items such as hairs, head and body parts to customize a users avatar.
Label for the Animation category of the catalog which contains items such as animation packages and emote animations.
Label for the Eyebrow category.
Label for the eyelash category.
Text is used as a label for the experience it was made in. For example: Made in Natural Disaster Survival
A prompt given to a user when clicking the ignore all button confirming before they ignore all friend requests.
english: Are you sure you want to ignore all friend requests?
translation: Sei sicuro di voler ignorare tutte le richieste di amicizia?

description: A cancel button used for modals.
A disclaimer for when you click the "ignore all" button on the friend requests page telling users the button will only ignore a max of 300 friend requests per click.
english: Note: This will at max remove your most recent 300 friend requests each time you click the 'Ignore All' button.
translation: Nota: questo rimuoverà al massimo le 300 richieste di amicizia più recenti ogni volta che fai clic sul pulsante "Ignora tutto".

description: MutualFriends between two users
mutual friends between two users.
english: {mutualFriendsCount, plural, =0 {# mutual friends} =1 {# mutual friend} other {# mutual friends}}
translation: {mutualFriendsCount, plural, =0 {# amici in comune} =1 {# amico in comune} other {# amici in comune}}

Label for a user that you are following
action to block a user
Singular form of friends
label for action to unblock a user
Tells the user that camera chat features are available

english: There was a problem submitting your report.
translation: C'è stato un problema con la tua segnalazione.

english: Tell us how you think the asset is breaking the rules of Roblox.
translation: Dicci come pensi che la risorsa stia infrangendo le regole di Roblox.

english: We are unable to respond to each report, but your feedback will help us improve the experience for all creators.
translation: Non siamo in grado di rispondere a ogni segnalazione, ma il tuo feedback ci aiuterà a migliorare l'esperienza di tutti i creator.

description: Error that appears when hitting max limit to the number of alpha-numeric characters in a user given textbox
english: Your comment must be less than {characterLimit} characters.
translation: Il tuo commento deve essere inferiore a {characterLimit} caratteri.

description: Allows the user to exit from the Abuse Report Screenshot Review section and go back to the game. Once they restart the report process from that point, another screenshot of the scene in-game is captured.
Shown to the user when they are asked to confirm if they would like to "Retake Scene" i.e. capture another screenshot for their Abuse Report.
english: Help us understand what’s happening around you. We’ll capture the scene the moment you select “Report.”
translation: Aiutaci a capire cosa sta accadendo intorno a te. cattureremo la scena nel momento in cui selezioni “Segnala”

description: This action causes the user to leave the Report Abuse form and return to the game/experience.
This action advances the user to the next page of the Abuse Report form.
Title for the Abuse Report screenshot annotation page where the user can tap/click on the screenshot to indicate which user(s) are abusive.
Title for the Abuse Report screenshot annotation page where the user can tap/click on the screenshot to indicate what content is abusive.

Allows the user to exit from the Abuse Report Screenshot Review section and go back to the game. Once they restart the report process from that point, another screenshot of the scene in-game is captured.

Message shown to user below the screenshot captured just before they entered the Report Abuse form. The quoted "Retake" is referring to a button with that label which, when clicked/tapped, will take the user out of the Abuse Report form, and back into the game, allowing them to capture another screenshot by restarting the report process.
english: If the problem is not in this scene, you can “Retake” the screenshot.
translation: Se il problema non è in questa scena, puoi riprendere lo screenshot.

description: This action causes the currently-previewed screenshot seen by the user to become attached/included with the Abuse Report they are filling out.
This action advances the user from the screenshot preview page of the Abuse Report form, to the page where they can annotate/highlight the screenshot to indicate where/who is abusive.
Used as a label to show legacy, non-layered shirts.
Used as a label to show legacy, non-layered t-shirts.
Used as a label to show legacy, non-layered pants.
Used as a label for a category that contains both Dresses and Skirts.
The Face Chat feature requires a camera to track the user's facial expressions.
The Face Chat feature is unavailable currently.
To use the Face Chat feature, go to the OS settings to allow Roblox client to use the camera.
english: Go to your settings to allow Roblox to use the camera.
translation: Vai alle impostazioni per consentire a Roblox di utilizzare la telecamera.

Confirm Button: when an item costs 0 Robux, the confirm button displays this string
Confirm Button: when player's Builders Club level is too low to purchase an assset, the confirm button displays this string and triggers the Builders Club upsell flow
Confirm Button: this is text is displayed on the button to confirm a normal purchase
Confirm Button: when player's Robux balance is insufficient, the confirm button displays this string
Cancel Button: the button to cancel a purchase and dismiss the prompt displays this string
Dismiss Button: when an error occurs or a purchase completes, the button to dismiss the prompt displays this string
Shown when a purchase is in flight, above a three-animating-dots style loading animation
Additional detail text for purchases of free items
english: Your account balance will not be affected by this transaction.
translation: I fondi del tuo account non verranno intaccati da questa transazione.

description: Additiona detail text displayed for purchases when in studio, where purchases are faked
english: This is a test purchase; your account will not be charged.
translation: Questo è un acquisto di prova; il tuo account non subirà addebiti.

description: Post-purchase additonal detail text displayed when in studio, where purchases are faked
translation: Questo era un acquisto di prova.

description: DEPRECATED - Additional detail text displayed when a player's Builders Club membership is insufficient to make a purchase. As of now, this string will actually have to correctly match up with ConfirmPurchase.UpgradeBuildersClub to avoid confusion. Would be nice to avoid that constraint, or bake it in somehow.
english: This item requires {BC_LEVEL}. Click 'Upgrade' to upgrade your Builders Club!
translation: Questo oggetto richiede: {BC_LEVEL}. Clicca su "Migliora" per potenziare il tuo Builders Club!

description: Additional detail text displayed during normal purchase flow, reflecting player's final balance if they choose to confirm the purchase
english: Your balance after this transaction will be R${BALANCE_FUTURE}

description: Post-purchase additional detail text indicating Robux value after successful purchase.
Addtional detail text displayed on mobile, where an upsell product is preselected for the player. The product likely won't match with the purchase cost of the item, so will prov
english: The remaining {REMAINING_ROBUX} Robux will be credited to your balance.
translation: I rimanenti {REMAINING_ROBUX} Robux verranno accreditati ai tuoi fondi.

description: Description text displayed on mobile when canceling an upsell purhcase. Occurs when a player does not have enough Robux, is prompted to buy more, and chooses not to.
english: Your purchase failed because your account does not have enough Robux. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Il tuo acquisto non è andato a buon fine poiché il tuo account non ha abbastanza Robux. Il tuo account non ha subito addebiti.

description: DEPRECATED - Description text displayed on desktop clients when player does not choose to purchase a builders club upsell (for an item that requires a higher builders club level than they possessed). This should be extremely rare, as there are few assets that have builders club requirements and are sold in games.
english: Your purchase failed because you need a subscription to purchase this item. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Il tuo acquisto non è riuscito poiché hai bisogno di un abbonamento per acquistare questo articolo. Il tuo account non ha subito alcun addebito.

description: Description text displayed on mobile and console, when a product costs more than any native purchase would provide. For example, an item costing 4000 robux is more expensive than any of our native Robux packages.
english: This item costs more Robux than you have available. Please leave this experience and go to the Robux screen to purchase more.
translation: Questo articolo costa più Robux di quello che hai a disposizione. Lascia questa esperienza e vai alla schermata Robux per acquistarne altri.

description: Description text displayed on desktop clients, when a product costs more than any single Robux package on our website would provide. For example, an item costing 50,000 robux is more expensive than any of our Robux packages.
english: This item cost more Robux than you can purchase. Please visit www.roblox.com to purchase more Robux.
translation: Questo oggetto costa più Robux di quanti tu possa acquistarne. Visita il sito www.roblox.com per acquistare altri ROBUX.

description: Description text displayed when purchases are disabled. This should be exceedingly rare, and will only happen if purchasing is disabled for all of Roblox.
english: Your purchase failed because In-experience purchases are temporarily disabled. Your account has not been charged. Please try again later.
translation: Il tuo acquisto non è riuscito perché gli acquisti In-esperienza sono temporaneamente disabilitati. Il tuo account non è stato addebitato. Per favore riprova più tardi.

description: Description text displayed in the case of an unknown error when we do not know the name of the item to be purchased. Usually would only happen if the game prompts the user to buy an invalid item.
english: Your purchase failed because something went wrong. Your account has not been charged. Please try again later.
translation: L'acquisto non è andato a buon fine a causa di un errore. Il tuo account non ha subito addebiti. Riprova più tardi.

description: Description text displayed in the case of an unknown error, generally something wrong with the network.
english: Your purchase of {ITEM_NAME} failed because something went wrong. Your account has not been charged. Please try again later.
translation: L'acquisto di {ITEM_NAME} non è andato a buon fine a causa di un errore. Il tuo account non ha subito addebiti. Riprova più tardi.

description: Description text displayed in the case of an error retrieving account info, generally something wrong with the network.
english: Cannot retrieve your balance at this time. Your account has not been charged. Please try again later.
translation: Impossibile recuperare i tuoi fondi in questo momento. Il tuo account non ha subito addebiti. Riprova più tardi.

description: Description text displayed in the case of an error retrieving the product, generally something wrong with the network.
english: We couldn't retrieve the price of the item at this time. Your account has not been charged. Please try again later.
translation: Impossibile recuperare il prezzo dell'oggetto in questo momento. Il tuo account non ha subito addebiti. Riprova più tardi.

description: Description text displayed when player is prompted to purchase a Limited or Limited Unique item that has no more copies remaining.
english: This limited item has no more copies. Try buying from another user on www.roblox.com. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Questo oggetto limitato non è più disponibile. Prova ad acquistarlo da un altro utente sul sito www.roblox.com. Il tuo account non ha subito addebiti.

description: Description text displayed when player is prompted to purchase an item that is no longer for sale
english: This item is not currently for sale. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Questo oggetto non è attualmente in vendita. Il tuo account non ha subito addebiti.

description: Description text displayed when player is prompted to make a purchase while logged in as a guest.
english: You need to create a ROBLOX account to buy items, visit www.roblox.com for more info.
translation: Per poter comprare oggetti, devi creare un account ROBLOX. Visita il sito www.roblox.com per maggiori informazioni.

description: Description text displayed when player is prompted to make a purchase that is not allowed because of third party purchase restrictions applied to the Place in question.
english: Third-party item sales have been disabled for this place. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Le vendite di oggetti di terzi sono state disattivate per questa località. Il tuo account non ha subito addebiti.

description: Description text displayed when an under-13 player is prompted to purchase an item that is restricted to 13-and-up players.
english: Your account is under 13. Purchase of this item is not allowed. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Il tuo account è per giocatori con meno di 13 anni. L'acquisto di questo oggetto non è permesso. Il tuo account non ha subito addebiti.

description: Description text displayed when a player is prompted to purchase an Asset or Game Pass they already own.
english: You already own this item. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Possiedi già questo oggetto. Il tuo account non ha subito addebiti.

description: Description text displayed when a player is prompted to purchase an item that costs 0 Robux.
english: Would you like to take {ITEM_NAME} for FREE?

description: Description text displayed when a player is prompted to purchase an item and has sufficient Robux to do so. Immediately below this, a price indicator is displayed, hence the dangling preposition.
Description text that is displayed after a purchase is completed.
translation: Il tuo acquisto di {ITEM_NAME} è andato a buon fine!

description: Description text that is displayed when a player is prompted to purchase an item that costs more Robux than their current balance.
english: You need {NEEDED_AMOUNT} more Robux to buy the {ASSET_TYPE} {ITEM_NAME}. Would you like to buy more Robux?
translation: Hai bisogno di {NEEDED_AMOUNT} Robux in più per comprare: {ASSET_TYPE} {ITEM_NAME}. Vuoi acquistare altri ROBUX?

description: This term is used to describe a Developer Product (https://www.robloxdev.com/articles/Developer-Products-In-Game-Purchases) which is created by users to sell within their own games. It's used in the same way an AssetType (like TShirt, Hair Accessory, etc.) might be used to describe the sort of item a player is attempting to buy.
Describes a 'bundle' that is from the Catalog.
Clicking this button confirms that the user would like to cancel a subscription. As in, "yes, I would like to cancel this subscription."
This text shows over the progress bar during a subscription cancellation. As in, "the system is canceling your subscription."
This message shows if a developer mistakenly prompts a user to cancel a subscription that they aren't currently paying for.
english: You aren't currently renewing this subscription. Your subscriptions have not changed.
translation: Al momento non stai rinnovando l'abbonamento. I tuoi abbonamenti non sono cambiati.

description: This message shows when a user successfully cancels a subscription. They get to keep their benefits for the rest of the remaining duration of their subscription, which is what the second part of the message describes.
english: You've canceled your {ITEM_NAME} subscription. You will retain your benefits until the end of the pay period.
translation: Hai disdetto l'abbonamento a {ITEM_NAME}. Manterrai i tuoi benefici fino alla fine del periodo di pagamento.

description: This message is shown when the user is prompted to cancel a subscription. They get to keep their benefits until the end of the period they paid for, which is what the second part of the message describes.
english: Are you sure you would like to cancel your {ITEM_NAME} subscription? You will retain your benefits until the end of the pay period.
translation: Sei sicuro di voler disdire l'abbonamento a {ITEM_NAME}. Manterrai i tuoi benefici fino alla fine del periodo di pagamento.

description: This message is shown to a user when they are prompted to start a subscription.
english: Want to subscribe to the subscription {ITEM_NAME} for

description: A word talking about subscriptions. As in, "would you like to subscribe to this Subscription?"
Communicates that the subscription will cost {PRICE} R$ per month. As in, "you will pay {PRICE} R$ per month until you cancel."
Price that's paid right now without a repeating interval. Probably doesn't need to be translated.
Labels the button that a user clicks to subscribe. As in, "Yes, I would like to subscribe to this subscription plan."
Additional detail text displayed when a player attempts to subscribe to a developer subscription plan, however is not subscribed to Premium.
english: You must be a Premium member in order to subscribe!
translation: Devi essere un membro Premium per poterti abbonare!

description: DEPRECATED - Confirm Button: when a player is not a premium member, the confirm button will display this string and trigger the Premium upsell flow

english: Your purchase failed because you need to be a Premium member to subscribe. Your account has not been charged
translation: Il tuo acquisto non è riuscito poiché devi essere un membro Premium per abbonarti. Il tuo account non ha subito alcun addebito.

english: Your balance after this transaction will be {BALANCE_FUTURE} Robux
translation: Dopo la transazione, i tuoi fondi ammonteranno a {BALANCE_FUTURE} Robux.

description: Description text displayed on mobile and console, when a product costs more than any native purchase would provide. For example, an item costing 4000 robux is more expensive than any of our native Robux packages.
english: This item cost more Robux than you have available.
translation: Questo oggetto costa più Robux di quanti tu ne abbia.

english: You need to have Roblox Premium in order to purchase this item.
translation: Hai bisogno di Roblox Premium per poter comprare questo oggetto.

description: Text shown to users under 13 when they are prompted to buy robux in order to buy an item.
english: This purchase involves the exchange of real money. I agree that I am at least 18 years of age, and am the parent or legal guardian of the account owner. I authorize this purchase and agree to the Terms of Use.
translation: Questo acquisto implica lo scambio di denaro reale. Riconosco di avere almeno 18 anni e di essere il genitore o il tutore legale del proprietario di questo account. Autorizzo questo acquisto e accetto i Termini di servizio.

description: Shown to users under 13 when they hit the first purchase threshold.
english: This purchase involves the exchange of real money.   I agree that I am at least 18 years of age, and am the parent or legal guardian of the account owner. I authorize this purchase and agree to the Terms of Use.
translation: Questo acquisto implica lo scambio di denaro reale. Confermo di avere almeno 18 anni e di essere il genitore o il tutore legale del proprietario di questo account. Autorizzo questo acquisto e accetto i Termini di servizio.

description: Shown to users under 13 when they hit the second purchase threshold.
english: You've spent a lot on Roblox this month. Do you want to proceed? This purchase involves the exchange of real money. You must be the parent or legal guardian of the account owner to authorize this purchase.
translation: Hai speso molto per Roblox questo mese. Vuoi procedere? Questo acquisto comporta lo scambio di vero denaro. Devi essere il genitore o il tutore legale del proprietario dell'account per autorizzare questo acquisto.

description: Shown to users under 13 when they hit the third purchase threshold and have parental email enabled.
english: You've spent a lot on Roblox this month. Receipts will be sent to the verified parental email on this account for this and all subsequent purchases.
translation: Hai speso molto su Roblox questo mese. Le ricevute verranno inviate all'indirizzo e-mail dei genitori verificato su questo account per questo e per tutti gli acquisti successivi.

english: This item can not be sold in this experience. Your account has not been charged.
translation: Questo articolo non può essere venduto in questa esperienza. Il tuo account non è stato addebitato.

description: Title of the alert modal

english: 2-Step Verification is required to make further transactions. Go to Settings > Security to complete 2-Step Verification.
translation: La verifica in due passaggi è necessaria per effettuare ulteriori transazioni. Vai a Impostazioni> Sicurezza per completare la verifica in due passaggi.

description: Title of prompt informing the user they must enable 2SV
Button on modal to open up security settings after being told to enable 2SV

english: 2-Step Verification is required to make further transactions. Go to Settings > Security to complete 2-Step Verification. Enabling 2-Step Verification will log you out of your current session.
translation: La verifica in due passaggi è necessaria per effettuare ulteriori transazioni. Vai su Impostazioni > Sicurezza per completare la verifica in due passaggi. L'abilitazione della verifica in due passaggi ti disconnetterà dalla sessione corrente.

description: Purchase reached the limit of how many items the user can own.
english: Whoops! The creator has limits on how many copies a single user can purchase from them.
translation: Ops! Il creatore ha posto limiti su quante copie un singolo utente può acquistare da loro.

english: You're going too fast! Try again in a minute.
translation: Stai andando troppo veloce! Riprova tra un minuto.

description: Disconnect from team create.
english: Lost connection to Team Create. Please reconnect.
translation: Connessione persa con la creazione della squadra. È necessario riconnettersi.

description: User's client version does not match with prod.
english: Your version of Roblox may be out of date.  Please update Roblox and try again.
translation: La tua versione di Roblox potrebbe essere obsoleta. Aggiorna Roblox e prova di nuovo.

description: unexpected exception happened on the client or the web exception returned like "HTTP 503 Service unavailable".
english: Teleport failed due to an unexpected error.
translation: Teletrasporto non riuscito a causa di un errore imprevisto.

description: Same player with same account joins same game from different device
english: Same account launched experience from different device. Leave the experience on the other device and try again.
translation: Lo stesso account ha lanciato l'esperienza da un dispositivo diverso. Lascia l'esperienza sull'altro dispositivo e riprova.

description: Exploit detected.
english: Lost connection due to an error.
translation: Connessione persa a causa di un errore.

description: Followed user has left the game.
english: The user you attempted to join has left the experience.
translation: L'utente a cui hai tentato di partecipare ha abbandonato l'esperienza.

description: User is trying to teleport to their friend A's Server instance while the server is full.
translation: Teletrasporto non riuscito, il server è al completo.

english: This experience is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
translation: Questa esperienza non è attualmente disponibile. Per favore riprova più tardi.

description: User is potentially join a server while right at joining the server get shut down.
english: Server was shutting down as you tried to connect.  Please try again.
translation: Il server è stato chiuso mentre provavi a connetterti. Riprova più tardi.

description: User is teleporting to a non-exist place.
english: Attempted to teleport to a place that does not exist.
translation: Tentativo di teletrasporto verso una località che non esiste.

description: General Disconnect Errors happens after you have launched a place successfully through place launcher.
english: Lost connection due to an unknown error. Please reconnect.
translation: Connessione persa a causa di un errore sconosciuto. Riconnettiti.

description: Game has 'Friend Only'/'Group Access Only' while user still tries to join without being a friend or a member of group.
english: You do not have permission to join this experience.
translation: Non hai i permessi necessari per partecipare a questa esperienza.

description: Exploit detected.
english: Lost connection due to an error. Multiple connections detected from same account.
translation: Connessione persa a causa di un errore. Sono state rilevate diverse connessioni dallo stesso account.

description: User is potentially using a modified client.
english: Lost connection due to an error.
translation: Connessione persa a causa di un errore.

description: Something is wrong during server-client communication (client sending data).
english: There was a problem sending data, please reconnect.
translation: C'è stato un problema durante l'invio dei dati, è necessario riconnettersi.

description: User is trying to do performance stat on client.
english: You have been kicked due to unexpected client behavior.
translation: Sei stato espulso a causa di un comportamento imprevisto del client.

description: Connection to server timeout.
english: Your connection timed out.  Check your internet connection and try again.
translation: La tua connessione è scaduta. Controlla la tua connessione a Internet e riprova.

description: Mostly due to site outage.
english: A Http error has occurred. Please close the client and try again.
translation: Si è verificato un errore http. Chiudi il client e riprova.

description: User is potentially using a modified client.
english: Lost connection due to an error.
translation: Connessione persa a causa di un errore.

description: General Teleport Errors happens during teleporting.
english: Teleport failed due to an unknown error.
translation: Teletrasporto non riuscito a causa di un errore sconosciuto.

english: This experience is currently unavailable. Please try again later.
translation: Questa esperienza non è attualmente disponibile. Per favore riprova più tardi.

description: User is trying to teleporting to their friend A's Server instance while the server has already shut down because A has left.
english: Teleport failed, server is no longer available.
translation: Teletrasporto non riuscito, il server non è più disponibile.

description: Player joined the game from another device
english: Same account launched experience from different device. Reconnect if you prefer to use this device.
translation: Lo stesso account ha avviato l'esperienza da un dispositivo diverso. Riconnettiti se preferisci utilizzare questo dispositivo.

description: Server is busy
english: The server is currently busy.  Please try again.
translation: Il server è al momento occupato. Riprova.

description: Network protocol version cannot be validated.
english: Your version of Roblox may be out of date.  Please update Roblox and try again.
translation: La tua versione di Roblox potrebbe essere obsoleta. Aggiorna Roblox e prova di nuovo.

description: Roblox shut down server (the game ops team regularly needs to put specific machines in bleed of and/or turn them off if they are having issues or if they need to do misc maintenance to the physical host)
english: Roblox has shut down the server for maintenance. Please try again.
translation: Roblox ha chiuso questo server per manutenzione. Riprova più tardi.

description: Time out.
english: Your connection timed out.  Check your internet connection and try again.
translation: La tua connessione è scaduta. Controlla la tua connessione a Internet e riprova.

description: Dev shut's down server

description: The text for the yellow Beta Badge

english: Please report abuse if you encounter people breaking our Community Guidelines. If you have opted-in to voice chat, Roblox records voice audio anywhere on the platform for moderation and safety purposes. By continuing to use the voice chat feature, you consent to Roblox's collection, use, and storage of your voice recording for moderation and safety purposes. You can opt-out of spatial voice at any time.
translation: Si prega di segnalare abusi se si incontrano persone che infrangono le nostre linee guida comunitarie. Se hai optato per la chat vocale, Roblox può registrare l'audio vocale ovunque sulla piattaforma per motivi di moderazione e sicurezza. Continuando a utilizzare la funzione di chat vocale, acconsenti alla raccolta, all'uso e all'archiviazione della registrazione vocale per motivi di moderazione e sicurezza. Puoi rinunciare alla voce spaziale in qualsiasi momento.

english: You have opted in to our beta feature, chat with voice. Roblox records voice audio anywhere on the platform for moderation and safety purposes. You can opt-out of chat with voice at any time.

description:
A short prefix that appears before the senders name when they send a message in a team channel. This is to indicate to the reader that they are recieving the incoming message from a team channel.

For example, if Bob sends a message to a team channel, their message will read:
[Team] Bob: Hello!

A short prefix that appears before the senders name when they send a message in a whisper channel. This is to indicate to the reader that they are receiving the incoming message from a whisper channel.

For example, if Bob sends a message to a whisper channel, their message will read:
[From Bob] Bob: Hello!

A short prefix that appears before the senders name when they send a message in a whisper channel. This is to indicate to the reader that they are sending the outgoing message from a whisper channel.

For example, if Bob sends a message to a whisper channel, their message will read:
[To Alice] Bob: Hello!

description: User's hardware does not support the animate your avatar feature. They will need to switch to another (newer) device.

translation: Il tuo hardware non soddisfa i requisiti per animare il tuo avatar usando la tua fotocamera.

english: Are you sure you want to leave the experience? You can access the tutorial again from “More”.
translation: Sei sicuro di voler lasciare l'esperienza? È possibile accedere di nuovo al tutorial da “Altro”.

description: Slideshow Header
slideshow footer
Header for perspective slide
Perspective description body 1
english: Try to switch between first and third-person perspective by clicking the thumbstick on your right controller.
translation: Prova a cambiare la prospettiva dalla prima persona alla terza persona facendo clic sulla levetta sul controller destro.

description: Perspective description body 2
english: By default, your perspective in Roblox is set to third-person, but you can choose to experience Roblox immersively in first-person.
translation: Per impostazione predefinita, la tua prospettiva in Roblox è impostata a terza persona, ma puoi scegliere di sperimentare Roblox in modo immersivo in prima persona.

description: Header for movement slide
Movement description body 1
english: To move around in an experience, use the thumbstick on your left controller.
translation: Per muoverti in un'esperienza, usa il thumbstick sul tuo controller sinistro.

description: Movement description body 2
Movement description body 3
english: To turn in place, use the right thumbstick to move left or right.
translation: Per ruotare in posizione, usa la miniatura destra per spostare a sinistra o a destra.

description: Header for Safety Bubble Slide
SafetyBubble description body 1
english: To ensure your safety in VR, we have introduced a feature called the Safety Bubble.
translation: Per garantire la tua sicurezza in VR, abbiamo introdotto una funzionalità chiamata Bolla di Sicurezza.

description: SafetyBubble description body 2
english: This is an invisible bubble around you that determines how close other players can get to you without fading out. You can adjust these controls in Experience Menu.
translation: Questa è una bolla invisibile intorno a te che determina quanto vicino altri giocatori possono arrivare a te senza svanire. È possibile regolare questi controlli in Menu Esperienza.

description: Header for Other Settings Slide
OtherSettings description body 1
english: You can also change other Comfort and Immersion settings in your Experience Menu.
translation: Puoi anche modificare altre impostazioni di Comfort e Immersione nel menu Esperienza.

description: OtherSettings description body 2
english:
That’s all for this tutorial! Now you are set up to enjoy Roblox!
Please use the leave button on the bottom bar to leave this experience.
translation:
Questo è tutto per questo tutorial! Ora sei pronto per goderti Roblox!
Si prega di utilizzare il pulsante lascia sulla barra in basso per uscire da questa esperienza.

description: Shown to users after they join an experience with 1 friend in it
Shown to users when they join an experience with 2 friends in it
Shown to users when they join an experience with more than 2 other friends in it
translation: Ti sei unito ad {FRIEND_NAME} e {FRIEND_COUNT} ad altri amici

description: Shown after a user follows another, but the followed user is in a different experience by the time the follower arrives
translation: {FRIEND_NAME} è uscito e si è unito a {EXPERIENCE_NAME}

description: Button action that can be clicked to follow the user to the experience the followed user is currently in
Shown when a user follows another user, and the followed user is not in a game when the follower enters the server
Button that is shown when a followed user isn't in the experience when the follower arrives. Clicking it sends an invite to the followed user to invite them back to the server.
Shown to users when another user intentionally joins their server
Sent after a user invites their friend to an experience.
Shown to users when they attempt to invite a user to a game and there's a network error that prevents the invitation from being sent.

Shown to users when they follow another user, and the followed user is in a place that cannot be joined directly (ex: followed user is on the third level of an obby with a different place per level, or if the game has separate places for a lobby, and in-round)
english: You joined {FRIEND_NAME}, but they are in a restricted place right now
translation: Ti sei unito ad {FRIEND_NAME}, ma sono in un posto limitato in questo momento

description: Shown to users when they follow another user, and the followed user is in a place that cannot be joined directly (ex: followed user is on the third level of an obby with a different place per level, or if the game has separate places for a lobby, and in-round)
english: Your friend {FRIEND_NAME} has moved to a restricted location within this experience
translation: Il tuo amico {FRIEND_NAME} si è spostato in una posizione ristretta all'interno di questa esperienza
